title: Emerald Radiance: Diamond and Emerald Haaram
materials: Crafted in [Assuming White Gold based on the image] White Gold. Featuring 15.01 carats of vibrant Emeralds (బచ్చలికూర రంగు పచ్చలు)
with diamonds of FG color totaling 9.90 carats. High clarity diamonds are meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize brilliance.
features: This Haaram blends modern design with traditional South Indian influences. The necklace features a graduated design, with larger Emeralds set as focal points, surrounded by intricate arrangements of diamond petals. Delicate diamond clusters gracefully hang from the Emeralds, creating a mesmerizing movement. The 'Kasulaperu' (coin necklace) effect is achieved through the meticulously arranged diamond elements which are like leaves.
colors: The color scheme is dominated by the brilliant white of the diamonds
complemented by the lush green of the Emeralds. The white gold provides a cool
modern backdrop that enhances the colors of the gemstones.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (పెళ్లి)
or milestone birthdays. Ideal for a bride's muhurtham
or for an elegant evening gala. Makes a stunning statement piece for cultural festivals and family celebrations (కుటుంబ వేడుకలు).
description: This exquisite Haaram is a harmonious blend of timeless elegance and modern design. The use of high-quality Emeralds and diamonds ensures enduring beauty and investment value. Its unique design is both striking and graceful, making it a true heirloom piece. The prong setting highlights the brilliance of the diamonds. Makes an elegant statement.
